description: The IB_MESSAGES_4 table contains basic information about In Basket messages.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the task record.

columns.name: PROC_ALG_LPL_ID
columns.description: A Patient Allergy Interaction message gets triggered whenever the entered allergy interacts with an existing order. This item stores the newly entered patient's allergy ID that interacts with the existing procedure orders.

columns.name: RFL_UPD_CVG_NEWLINE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the line number of new coverage information that was updated by the most recent Care Everywhere referral update message.

columns.name: RFL_UPD_CVG_OLDLINE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the line number of old coverage information that was updated by the most recent Care Everywhere referral update message.

columns.name: MYC_CONVO_THREAD_ID
columns.description: Contains the MyChart Conversation for this message.

columns.name: NOTIF_SUBJ_SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The subject SmartText for the notification. Used if the Letter Review is sent as a MyChart Message.

columns.name: NOTIF_SUBJ_SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: NOTIF_USE_PDF_YN
columns.description:
Determines whether the notification will be sent as a PDF. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: QUERY_TICKET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Care Everywhere data exchange ticket for the patient associated with this message. This column along with the QUERY_TICKET_LINE column can be used to link to the CEID_QUERY_AUDIT table.

columns.name: QUERY_TICKET_LINE
columns.description: Line number of the query audit information in the Care Everywhere data exchange ticket for the patient associated with this message. This column along with the QUERY_TICKET_ID column can be used to link to the CEID_QUERY_AUDIT table.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_EVENT_IDENT
columns.description: The event identifier for an outside document related to this message.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_DOC_IDENT
columns.description: The document identifier for the outside document related to this message.

columns.name: POC_VERSION_CSN
columns.description: Specifies the contact serial number (CSN) of the updated specialty plan of care version from which the In Basket message was generated.

columns.name: HH_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The Episode ID for the visit set associated with this message.

columns.name: HH_CONTACT_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The home care contact type ID for the visit set associated with this message.

columns.name: HH_CONTACT_TIME_UNKNOWN
columns.description: Whether the time for the visit set associated with this message has been determined.

columns.name: HH_RECURRENCE_PATTERN
columns.description: The recurrence pattern for the visit set associated with this message.

columns.name: HH_VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The home care order ID for the visit set associated with this message.

columns.name: HH_LVO_VISIT_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the line number on the home care order for the visit set associated with this message.

columns.name: IS_AUTO_RAR_RESUBMISSION_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this is a refill request that is automatically re-submitted by the system. 'Y' indicates that this is a refill request that is automatically re-submitted by the system. 'N' or NULL indicates this is not automatically re-submitted by the system or is not a refill request.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NOTIF_USE_PDF_YN
